results_page.about: Free Disc Brake Australia products for those who win each race.  Free to join the league and we run a fix car setup.  This league is designed to be a fun way to spend the off season.

Hello and thank you for checking out “ iRacing Stock Car Challenge” or the ISCC for short. 
 
 Who we are: 
 This is our fifth season as a league but we have very talented drivers within our ranks. 
 We are broadcasted by Turn 3 Racing Network on both Facebook and YouTube! 
 
 What we do: 
 We run a iRacing Default setup for each track as well as real time weather for that area. We have the current NASCAR playoff system in place and do roughly 50% of the real life distances. 
 
 Requirements: 
 If you are interested in joining the league, all we ask is that you have a C class license and over 1500 iRating. As well to join discord, though it's optional, yet highly recommended you do so to retrieve info on race day or for any activities during the week.

We here at 5150 strive to be as professional as we can in racing while maintaining a certain aspect of humor, fun, and some good ole' fashioned American style ball busting. While we take every race seriously and are very much competitive in nature, we also strive to be a friendly gaming community, friends and sometimes become more like family. We give the newer drivers a place where you can learn and improve, while at the same time we give other drivers the chance to be competitive. We don't tolerate TOXIC behavior, and expect everyone to treat each other with respect. If this sounds like the right league for you, come check us out and have some fun with us. 
 
 5150 ARCA Series Race Days: Wednesdays 8:30pm Eastern

We here at 5150 strive to be as professional as we can in racing while maintaining a certain aspect of humor, fun, and some good ole fashioned American style ball busting. While we take every race seriously, and are very much competitive in nature we also strive to be overall a gaming community, friends and sometimes become more like family. You ask yourself why do i need to join 5150? Well that answer is pretty simple......We drive harder than Ricky bobby in the brickyard 500, we make days of thunder look like a true story based on us all while maintaining that.....special twinkle in your mommy's eyes when she talks about us. 
 
 We will have both Street Stocks and UMP Modifieds, back to back, on Wednesday Nights starting on January 3rd!

6 Week Schedule, using GTE (GTLM) and GT3 (GTD) cars.
For the first season, we will be using FIXED setups. Some tracks we were able to get custom setups. Others, we were not.

Schedule:
Week 1: Daytona Intl Speedway (Road Course) - 60 Mins
Week 2: Watkins Glen (Boot W/ Chicane) - 45 Mins
Week 3: Road America - 45 Mins
Week 4: Laguna Seca - 45 Mins
Week 5: Lime Rock - 45 Mins
Week 6: Long Beach - 60 Mins

All races are 8x time acceleration

results_page.league_name: #0 Clean Racing League Monday Truck Fix Setup
results_page.about:
Monday nights Trucks. 
 Practice 7:30PM Eastern 
 Qualifying 8:30PM Eastern followed by race 
 Fixed setup / 75% fuel / Race Lengths vary per track / Extra tires vary depending on track. 
 This is a League for multiple skill levels and levels of experience, focused on providing a respectful, competitive, NON-Toxic, sim racing community/experience. Season 20 and no signs of slowing down!

results_page.league_name: #0 Clean Racing League Thursday Cup Series
results_page.about:
https://discord.com/invite/zSNKrXn7WA 
 
 Most of us in this league have run together in the www.cleanracing.net league for awhile now and wanted another league to run in together. 
 
 This league will race Thursday Nights at 8:30 EST with practices starting at 7:30 EST. We will try to broadcast select races provided we have enough funding and put the rest of the donations towards season prizes. 
 
 ​ 
 
 The league will run 10 weeks with 2 drop weeks. The league is managed on SimRacerHub 
 
 ​ 
 
 We will be running Xfinity and eventually plan to expand to Next Gen, Arca, and Trucks and have a tiered league where you must meet certain performance standards to move between leagues. 
 
 ​ 
 
 We will hold open recruitment races to grow this league, but also encourage word of mouth. 
 
 ​ 
 
 Field sizes will be capped at 30 cars. Once we consistently get 30 cars every season, we will start adding more series.
RACING FIXED EVERY NIGHT AT 9PM EST AND NEW SEASONS FORMING

results_page.league_name: #0 Donut Box Firestone Late Model Series
results_page.about:
This league is for the Donut Box Firestone Mondays. We are proud to announce that the Monday Night Lates are now sponsored by Firestone. We will send out contingencies to place onto your cars. 
 
 Donut Box Monday Night Madness (DBMNM) runs on Monday nights with fixed sets, a heat, a short qualifying, then a main. its fixed setups and has a max of 3500 iRating. This series will be broadcasted by Blake Hutchinson.

GT3 Class (same cars as iRacing VRS Series) 
 We will be starting Season 2 shortly into 2024 and run for a few months. 
 We will run Every other Wednesday with session opening at 8pm EST for a 45 minute practice, a 15 minute open qualifying at 8:45pm EST, a 20 minute sprint at 9pm EST, then a 40 minute feature with the whole field getting inverted. 
 Fixed setup 
 1 fast repair, 
 1 set of tires 
 Forced pit stop in the feature. 
 Weather and track state randomly generated. 
 No irating caps 
 Free entry
A full length truck series following the real truck schedule. Open setup with stages runnning Sunday evenings with practice at 7:30pm est and race at 8pm est. Join the Discord for more info.

The Donut Box Xfinity Series (DBXS) #9591: 
 NASCAR Class B Xfinity cars 
 This will be a paid entry league $25 
 We will run on Thursday nights with Practice at 7:30pm EST. Qual at 8:20pm EST, Race start 8:30pm EST. 
 We will run a 17 race season with 10 regular season races, then a 7 race playoffs split into 4 rounds with 2 races in each round before the final. 
 Race lengths will be about the same as the real life Truck Series runs 
 2 Stage Cautions 
 Fixed Setup 
 1 Fast Repair 
 Varying sets of tires 
 Fuel lowered to force pit stops 
 Leader Chooses Lane 
 Randomly generated weather and track states 
 It will be paid entry (see above)

Casual league that sets up multiple different races. Feel free to race as little or as much as you like. 
 
 League is currently on hiatus, as we cannot find any admins to help run the league. If you want to help run the league, join our Discord and message Maple. discord.gg/hox

 Please note: That as your primary sponsor, our company graphics/logo will be the title position for your liveries. Other sponsors are allowed as well. Cheers.

N.A.S. (North American Simsport)

  NAS is a new sim racing network of drivers on different gaming platforms that trying to connect to people in North America only, for a better gaming experience.  Its better to race with people in our region for network connection stability, and for race scheduling due to our timezones.  Our main focus is iRacing, with our league just starting up in January, we hope to recruit drivers for Road and Oval season.  We also have some experts on web-developing, Streaming, Networking, Graphic Design

The Red Door (TRD) live virtual music venue is not a business, does not accept donations, and is privately funded for the sole purpose of enhancing the virtual experience through hosting live virtual performances, races and general in-world social activities on various platforms for entertainment.

TRD has hosted racing events in Secondlife.com and Sansar.  This is our first hosted race in iRacing.com and look forward to hosting more in the future. We appreciate your patience, suggestions and feedback.

Discordhttps://discord.gg/jpkPdZ5 
 
 
 https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCRgsux0Fe4WNcQrwinibBZA?view_as=subscriber

FIXED SETUP - CUP, TRUCKS, STREET STOCKS, LATE MODEL STOCKS 
 
 Est 2010 Providing clean, and competitive racing with fixed setups for 13 years. SCL is an online e-racing league that sanctions one of the best in console/pc based sim championship racing. Traditionally based on the Gran Turismo series, SCL transitioned to ps4 and the Project Cars 2 game in fall 2017. We have now transitioned to iRacing for our 10th Anniversary. SCL championship seasons typically run approximately 13 weeks followed by a 4-5 week offseason, which has resulted in 35 completed championship seasons since 2010. 
 
 SCL is unique in that we have blended a fine combination of staying true to our roots and what we have built ourselves upon, while also having schedules that appeal to a broad population. 
 
 You can check out our broadcasted series on Sim Racing Media's YouTube Channel.

Street stocks for all licenses. This season is currently in creation and will begin with a full schedule when enough members have joined to make it competitive. Races will be held every Tuesday and Thursday at 8pm est. Tracks will be mostly short asphalt with a mile and half thrown in from time to time.

results_page.league_name: #001 FurEver Fans Stock Car Racing Series
results_page.about: A Nascar based league created by Furries, for Furries, and is also open to the people that support the Furry community.

Weird and stupid challenges every week. $5 gift card to the winner of each season. FREE CONTENT IN OFFICIAL LEAGUE EVENTS ONLY. iRacing is not only a place for hardcore training and high-performance driving. It's a place to find new teammates, make new friends and have fun overall. iPunting offers you a new way to look at old concepts. We take familiar ingredients and turn in into something new!

This league will only use free content for its races. Races will be on Wednesday Nights 9 pm CST. We welcome all levels of racers who want to get better at iRacing. Races will start when there are at least 20 members.
Friendly league run by everyone who joins.

looking  to have fun and race hard, will be running NWMT, K and N east , arca, and cars slm tour we will try to run the schedule as close as possible to the real thing. if this sounds like fun come and join us.
